tool_description: Creates detailed turn-by-turn navigation instructions from route geometry with distance and direction information.

route_geometry.description: Array of coordinate points defining the route path

instruction_detail.description: Level of instruction detail: basic, standard, or verbose

error_messages: Invalid route geometry: Route must contain at least 2 coordinate points.
Invalid instruction detail: Use basic, standard, or verbose.
Invalid distance units: Use metric or imperial.
Invalid language code: Use valid ISO 639-1 language codes.
Route too complex: Maximum 1000 coordinate points supported.
Instruction generation failed: Unable to generate navigation instructions for provided route.
usage: Provide route geometry with instruction preferences and language settings. Returns comprehensive turn-by-turn navigation guidance.

instruction_summary.description: Summary of navigation instructions and route overview
